action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
HI team,

Can you please province Kinsta access for liquid digital to southernstarresearch.com

Once done, please confirm with Hugues via email (cc me).

Thank you

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Hugues Deraps <hugh@liquid.digital>
Date: Thu, Mar 20, 2025 at 8:27 AM
Subject: Re: Introduction to Liquid Digital - Our New Agency Partner
To: Andy Crebar <andy@wolfiq.com.au>
Cc: Simi Barretto <sbarretto@southernstarresearch.com>, Heath Maguire <heath.maguire@wolfiq.com.au>, Michael Soden <mikes@liquiddigital.net.au>, Niroshan Shrestha <niroshan@liquiddigital.net.au>


Hi Andy,

Kinsta Access would be great; please use admin@liquid.digital for our account.

Cheers

Hugh

On Wed, Mar 19, 2025 at 10:41 PM Andy Crebar <andy@wolfiq.com.au> wrote:
Hi Hugues,

It may be most efficient to give you Kinsta access so you can access the staging server and also SFTP.

Could you confirm what email we should invite?

On the recovery request, we don't receive them regularly but typically take 24 - 48 hours.

Thank you,
Andy

On Tue, Mar 18, 2025 at 5:10 PM Hugues Deraps <hugh@liquid.digital> wrote:
Hi all,

Thanks for the follow up.

Yes FTP access would be good.

Are we able to also do test content updates on the staging site? Can we have access to that?

Lastly, as a good to know, how quick does your team respond to a recovery request usually?

Let us know

Cheers

Hugh

Hugues Deraps
Digital Producer
M: +61 423 745 699
Liquid.Digital

This email was sent using my mobile phone.

On Tue, 18 Mar 2025, 15:42 Simi Barretto, <sbarretto@southernstarresearch.com> wrote:
Thanks, Heath.

I'm copying in @Hugues Deraps for will take the lead on this.

Cheers,

Simi

Simran Barretto Marketing and Digital Media Manager

Southern Star Research Pty Ltd
 T: +61 2 9011 6266
 southernstarresearch.com I Linked in

From: Heath Maguire <heath.maguire@wolfiq.com.au>
Sent: Monday, 17 March 2025 1:54 PM
To: Simi Barretto <sbarretto@southernstarresearch.com>
Cc: Andy Crebar <andy@wolfiq.com.au>; mikes@liquiddigital.net.au <mikes@liquiddigital.net.au>; niroshan@liquiddigital.net.au <niroshan@liquiddigital.net.au>
Subject: Re: Introduction to Liquid Digital - Our New Agency Partner
Caution: This is an external email and may be malicious. Please take care when clicking links or opening attachments.

Hi Simi,

Thanks for your patience. First up, to answer your questions:
  1. Do you have a server dashboard where we can access the daily backup in case SSR needs to roll back?
    Yes, this can be provided. However, it's best if this is requested to the team at support@wolfiq.com.au for our procedures to be followed.

  2. Currently, do you maintain WordPress from the server level or manually?
    We maintain WordPress updates primarily through a 3rd party tool that tracks all updates that are performed. From time-to-time we may have to run updates directly within WordPress, however, this is rare. We do run a staging environment as well if there are 'risky' updates that need to be tested before pushing to production.

  3. Is there any other repo, system or license we should know about?
    Yes, we store on-server backups, which are taken daily or before any major events, such as a push from staging to production - 30-day basis. Additionally, we take incremental off-server backups as a redundancy. These are saved on a rolling 90-day basis.
Liquid Digital - We can provide SFTP access if this is needed for you to upload your files etc. Or will your WordPress access be sufficient?

Thanks,

Heath





Hi WolfIQ team,

I hope you guys had a good weekend. Can you please provide an update asap as I want to go live with the webinar page tomorrow.

Liquid Digital has everything ready from their end.

Cheers,

Simi

Simran Barretto Marketing and Digital Media Manager

Southern Star Research Pty Ltd
 T: +61 2 9011 6266
 southernstarresearch.com I Linked in

From: Andy Crebar <andy@wolfiq.com.au>
Sent: Thursday, 13 March 2025 8:34 PM
To: Hugues Deraps <hugh@liquid.digital>
Cc: Simi Barretto <sbarretto@southernstarresearch.com>; Michael Soden <mikes@liquiddigital.net.au>; Niroshan Shrestha <niroshan@liquiddigital.net.au>
Subject: Re: Introduction to Liquid Digital - Our New Agency Partner
Caution: This is an external email and may be malicious. Please take care when clicking links or opening attachments.

Hi All,

Jumping in here as Heath was out of office today.

Thanks for the intro Simran and nice to meet you Hugues.

We'll get back to you on these before the end of the week.

Thanks,
Andy

On Thu, Mar 13, 2025 at 3:35 PM Hugues Deraps <hugh@liquid.digital> wrote:
Hi Heath,

Nice to e-meet you.

We looked around and understood that the whole site relies on Breakdance visual builder and ACF.

Our questions are:
  1. Do you have a server dashboard where we can access the daily backup in case SSR needs to roll back?
  2. Currently, do you maintain WordPress from the server level or manually?
  3. Is there any other repo, system or license we should know about?
Let us know

Cheers

Hugh

Hugues Deraps | Digital Producer
E: hugh@liquid.digital | T: +61 2 8006 0085 | M: +61 423 745 699

On Wed, Mar 12, 2025 at 4:09 PM Simi Barretto <sbarretto@southernstarresearch.com> wrote:
Hi Heath, I hope you're doing well.

I wanted to introduce Liquid Digital, our new agency replacing Brand Chemistry. LD will be supporting us with the below for now:
  • Google Ads & SEM activities
  • SEO
  • Website updates
  • Reports
  • Design work

I've already given the LD team access to our HubSpot and WordPress accounts, but they will need additional permissions to create some pages I've requested.

Would WolfIQ be able to jump on a call this week so I can introduce the Liquid Digital team to you and check if they have the necessary access? Let me know your availability and I'll work around it. Speak soon!

Cheers,

Simi

Simran Barretto Marketing and Digital Media Manager

Southern Star Research Pty Ltd
 T: +61 2 9011 6266
 southernstarresearch.com I Linked in
